mapper.insert: insert into re_meeting( meeting_id, user_id, context ) values (#{meetingId}, #{userId}, #{content})
mapper.select: select r.re_meeting_id as reMeetingId, r.meeting_id as meetingId, r.user_id as userId, m.user_name as userName, r.context as content, to_char(r.reg_dt, 'yy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as regDate from re_meeting r join users m on m.user_id = r.user_id where r.meeting_id = #{value} order by r.re_meeting_id
